short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Stashit Web Clipper companion extension. Save small snippets or entire pages to your Stashit account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A better place to store your stuff.

The Stashit Web Clipper extension allows you to capture web snippets and save them directly to your Stashit account. Stashit makes saving and organizing the content you care about simple. Keep your clipped web content organized in collections and come back later to easily view them in your Snippet Stash.

With the Stashit Web Clipper, you can...

* Stash small sections or the entire page
* Save all of your favorite recipes
* Snip just images or blocks of text
* Keep snippets organized in collections
* Snip blog articles
* Snip social media posts
* Save pretty much anything you see on the web
* Save news articles

Instead of digging through bookmarks just to view your saved content, stash web snippets instead. 

* Use fuzzy search that quickly filters results.
* Save snippets in Stashit along with your photos, files, and emails.

Start stashing and get your digital life organized.

Send your feedback to support@stashit.app
